constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 70 (Thursday, April 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. VELAZQUEZ:
H.R. 2826.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1
The Congress shall have Power to . . . provide for the . .
. general Welfare of the United States; . . .
[Page H2109]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: To establish a Global Climate Change Resilience Strategy, to authorize the admission of climate-displaced persons, and for other purposes.
